name: Music Tiles - Piano Tiles Go
description:
NOT just piano! This is MUSIC TILES.

Music Tiles is much more fun because it presents not just piano music, but also various other genres of music.


How to Play: 
1. Click the black tiles and don’t tap the white tiles.
2. Tap on the blue tiles and hold until the end of the tile.


Features:
1. Intuitive gameplay and beautiful graphics
2. Various instruments for you to play: keyboard, saxophone, drum, guitar, piano, violin, flute, etc.
3. Various genres, styles, & types of music: electronic, EDM, 8bit, pop, rock, blues, classic, band, etc.
4. High quality mp3 and songs; thrilling listening experience.
5. Play the ENDLESS mode to challenge your hand speed limit.
6. Login Facebook to sync your data on multiple devices, save your progress via Facebook account.
7. Download mp3 file & game data from cloud, save your SD card space.
8. Free preview of music before you play music tiles.

Relax and enjoy Music Tiles!
